contract_items.content: Generate final project state with routing decision

evidence.description: Final project state generated with complete routing decision: complexity score 78/100, extended discovery route, MCP workflow configuration, and transition readiness.

contract_items.content: Create routing documentation with next steps

evidence.description: Comprehensive routing documentation created with extended discovery workflow plan, investigation priorities, phase breakdown, and success criteria.

contract_items.content: Update workflow state to complete assessment

evidence.description: Workflow state updated to 'discovery_assessment_complete' with assessment_complete flag set to true and transition_ready status.

contract_items.content: Generate transition plan for next phase

evidence.content: Transition plan generated for Extended Discovery Phase 1: handover documentation complete, deliverables ready, knowledge transfer established, success criteria defined, and immediate next steps outlined.
